title: Procelain Skin Whitening Serum Hydroquinone Kojic Acid Glycolic Acid Vitamin C Licorice Mulberry Extract for Melasma, Hyperpigmentation 2oz
description: Porcelain Skin Whitening Serum is professionally formulated to visibly fade/remove age spots/brown spots, freckles, sun spots, acne scars, Uneven skin tone. Our product is based on multiple effective ingredients that provide synergetic effects, exfoliate and penetrate skin more effectively than hydroquinone alone.The benefits of the serum:- Fade/Remove Age Spots/Brown Spots, Freckles, sun spots, Acne Scars,uneven skin tone- Prevent future skin dark spots production- Reduce skin damage from sun exposure- Botanical extracts provide a rich source of antioxidants and vitamins- Improvement to skin tone and texture- Suitable for all skin types, whole face skinThe unique features:- Unique combination of multiple ingredients clinically proven to effectively treat the symptoms of melasma.- Hydroquinone is FDA approved and well-researched ingredient, incredibly effective for its intended purpose. No other skin lightening ingredient compares to its effectiveness.- Kojic acid has been proven by many researches to be effective for inhibiting melanin production.-Glycolic acid is believed that its benefit is in helping cell turnover rates and removing unhealthy or abnormal layers of superficial skin cells where hyperpigmented cells can accumulate.-Licorice root extracts has proven to be effective in anti-aging, rosacea, pigmented, sensitive and acne prone skin.- And much, much more...Is Hydroquione safe?Interestingly, hydroquinone happens to be a potent antioxidant and there is even research showing that workers who handle pure hydroquinone actually have lower incidences of cancer than the population as a whole.Our product is manufactured with highest quality and fresh to ensure the best results.

title: Viviscal Professional - Professional Supplement 60 Tablets Hair Nutrition Program
description:
How Does Viviscal Professional Supplements work?

4 Stages to Healthier Hair
Viviscal Professional supplements work in 4 stages over a 6 month period. A difference is often noticed in 2 to 4 months, in line with each individual patient's natural hair cycle.
Stage 1	Hair follicles are nourished through consistent intake of nutrients and marine
protein in each tablet

Stage 2	Thin and wispy hair is strengthened through increased nourishment

Stage 3	Breakage and thinning continues to decline, encouraging existing hair growth

Stage 4	These hairs become stronger, healthier, and more vibrant as nutrients are
thoroughly replenished

How Should Viviscal Professional Supplements be taken?

Viviscal tablets taken twice a day for a minimum of 6 months or until the desired results have been achieved (1 in the morning and 1 in the evening, taken with water after food). Thereafter, take 1-2 tablets daily as required. Professional tablets are easy to swallow and virtually odor free.

 
Viviscal Professional Supplements
Viviscal Professional Supplements are naturally based food supplements containing the following active ingredients:

    AminoMar CTM Marine Complex - provides the essential nutrients needed to nourish thinning hair and promote existing hair growth.
    Horsetail Plant Extract - an organic form of silica, increases the strength of the hair and revitalises lifeless hair.
    Vitamin C - derived from the Acerola Cherry (one of the richest source of Vitamin C), with highly effective anti-oxidant properties. 

One tablet contains:

    AminoMar CTM (Marine Protein Extract): 350mg
    Acerola Cherry Extract (Vitamin C 30mg: 50% RDA*): 120mg
    Horsetail Extract equivalent to: 30mg 

*Recommended Daily Allowance

Other Ingredients:

AminoMar CTM (Marine Extract), Acerola Cherry Extract (Malphigia Glabra L), Microcrystalline Cellulose, Horsetail Extract (Equisetum Arvense L), Natural Orange Flavour, Magnesium Stearate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Glycerol.
